result.eng: What is the soup of the day?
result.ga: cad é anraith an lae
result.orig: cad é anraith an lae
result.html: cad é anraith an laeWhat is the soup of the day?
result.ponchtml: cad é anraiṫ an laeWhat is the soup of the day?

result.eng: The soup doesn't agree with me.
result.ga: ní réitíonn an t-anraith liom
result.orig: ní réitíonn an t-anraith liom
result.html: ní réitíonn an t-anraith liomThe soup doesn't agree with me.
result.ponchtml: ní réitíonn an t-anraiṫ liomThe soup doesn't agree with me.

result.eng: The soup should be ready for the lunchtime rush.
result.ga: ba cheart go mbeadh an t-anraith réidh do rabharta an lóin
result.orig: ba cheart go mbeadh an t-anraith réidh do rabharta an lóin
result.html: ba cheart go mbeadh an t-anraith réidh do rabharta an lóinThe soup should be ready for the lunchtime rush.
result.ponchtml: ba ċeart go mbeaḋ an t-anraiṫ réiḋ do raḃarta an lóinThe soup should be ready for the lunchtime rush.
